title: [集思廣益]正能量white dolphin 遊戲

replies.msg:
遊戲目的: 目的要人positive 舒緩生活壓力

各位巴打幫手諗諗有咩可以做去達到以上既目的

例如: 停止手上工作 拿5分鐘做一樣令人開心既野
問唔識既囡囡攞電話

問唔識既囡囡攞電話

同一個唔識既女性影張相
講d做到既得唔得

講d做到既得唔得


影一張你認為係靚既相 po上黎

講d做到既得唔得

一係撩女 一係去死 你簡邊樣?

update 下先
暫時覺得可行
1.早睡早起
2. 影一張自己覺得靚既野
3. 聽正能量歌
4. 做義工
5. 睇笑片
6. 對住鏡自我鼓勵
7. 搵興趣去學

遊戲要有啲規則
例如唔可以騷擾到人 做完果樣野唔可以難受等等

睇日出
搵一個set 做要share 依隻game比人咁好唔好

一開始果20個活動最好one action
例如唱首歌比人聽
出街讚下人
幫人開門
慢慢升級做
同陌生人傾計
捐晒全份糧畀同事

捐晒全份糧畀同事

同事會好開心 但我會好難受

叫佢地出街撩女

下場:比女仔當佢怪物咁急急腳走
周圍d人細細聲鬧佢咁樣衰都想識女仔點解唔照下鏡
結果自殺

所以要定啲規則 唔騷擾到人 自己又唔可以有難受既感覺

不如分幾個階段去做
第一階段主要聽下正能量歌，睇笑片，睇正能量文章，出街呢種唔會影響到人既任務 去第二階段之前要打扮好自己既外表
而第二階段會開始同人互動，例如上網識人，出街問路，搭小巴要有自信叫落，約番好耐冇見既朋友一齊出街，傾電話 同屋企人傾心事 目的係建立同其他人社交既能力
最後既階段就會開始同陌生人直接交流 例如 拎異性電話 約網友見面 落club落bar 而終點係識到女朋友
如果係咁既大家點睇

update 下先
暫時覺得可行
1.早睡早起 (12點前訓 7點起起身)
2. 影一張自己覺得靚既野 (可以係日落 可以係動物)
3. 每日至少聽一次正能量歌.(皆大歡喜, 紅日 ,生命無價)
4. 一個月至少做一次義工
5. 睇笑片令自己大笑一場
6. 每朝梳洗完對住鏡自我鼓勵 (今日一定會好開心架蝦毛太郎)
7. 搵一樣興趣去學 充實自己
8. 寫一封信比你既朋友 關心下佢近況(可以係成日見既/去左外國/好耐無搵既)

遊戲要有啲規則
例如唔可以騷擾到人 做完果樣野唔可以難受等等
遊戲會有一啲規限 例如做唔曬所有野既就捐一筆錢比慈善機構 /請朋友食飯 黎比動力自己去keep住做
好似益智左d 唔夠搞笑無人理

好似益智左d 唔夠搞笑無人理

太正能量所以無人理 不過我自己都會試下做曬list入面既野 set個限期比自己
坐關愛座
同屋企人正正經經食餐飯 關心下佢地點 唔好成日俾籍口自己話好忙

同屋企人正正經經食餐飯 關心下佢地點 唔好成日俾籍口自己話好忙

係啊！好似越大越少傾計 又唔識表達自己
成日覺得我地個個都好冷漠 會關心身邊嘅人係件好奢侈嘅事
每個人都忙 忙到冇左生活好迷惘咁
早d起身煮份早餐畀自己同屋企人
每日朗讀一段耶經比腦細聽
用原字筆畫個哈哈笑係手

推一推
覺得好有意義 真係有得諗
淨係要早睡早起 做下運動 見下屋企人呢啲
都已經好正面 諗落都覺得開心

用原字筆畫個哈哈笑係手

簡簡單單就會好開心

食buffet
自慰
聽古典音樂冥想五分鐘
同父母食飯，要有計傾，唔準用手機
推

update 下先 綜合各巴打建議
暫時覺得可行
1.早睡早起 (12點前訓 7點起起身)
2. 影一張自己覺得靚既野 分享比身邊既朋友 (可以係日落 可以係動物)
3. 每日至少聽一次正能量歌.(皆大歡喜, 紅日 ,生命無價)
4. 一個月至少做一次義工
5. 睇笑片令自己大笑一場
6. 每朝梳洗完對住鏡自我鼓勵 (今日一定會好開心架蝦毛太郎)
7. 搵一樣興趣去學 充實自己
8. 寫一封信比你既朋友 關心下佢近況(可以係成日見既/去左外國/好耐無搵既)
9. 完全唔做任何野 係一個靜既環境冥想五分鐘
10. 一星期做一次運動 (令到自己有累既感覺 釋放曬自己既壓力)
11.同屋企人正經食一餐飯 唔可以用手機 關心下屋企人
12. 搵一個呢個星期幫過你/令你開心嘅人去多謝佢，並係社交平台講下件事
13. 同屋企人/好朋友影一張搞笑嘅合照， 如果可以曬出黎 並放係自己常見既地方
14 係自己schedule book寫低一句正面格言(每星期)，並且搵出佢嘅典故

遊戲要有啲規則
例如唔可以騷擾到人 做完果樣野唔可以難受等等
遊戲會有一啲規限 例如做唔曬所有野既就捐一筆錢比慈善機構 /請朋友食飯 黎比動力自己去keep住做
好肯定唔會有人玩
高汁
每日六點起身 然後組團晨跑
參考下pink whale

好肯定唔會有人玩

英文唔好但都盡量整個英文版本出黎
英文好既人幫我改下

1. Sleep before midnight and get up before 7am.
2. Take a photo of a beautiful moment/thing and share it to your friends. (E.g. sunset, animals, etc.)
3. Listen to a positive and motivational song every day.
4. Volunteer at least once a month.
5. Watch comedy movies to make you laugh.
6. Motivate yourself after your personal grooming
7. Get involved with a course to learn something you are keen on.
8. Send a mail to your friends to show them you care.
9. Relax and mediate for 5 minutes.
10. Exercise or play sport at least once a month.
11. Have a proper meal with your family and have a great conversation with them, do not use your cell phone during the entire meal.
12. Say thank you to those have helped you, and share this on your social media.
13. Take a funny photo with your family members/ best friends. Print it out and put it in an obvious place.
14. Write down an inspirational motto on your notebook every week and find out its allusion.
15. Make a family meal.

英文唔好但都盡量整個英文版本出黎
英文好既人幫我改下

1. Sleep before midnight and get up before 7am.
2. Take a photo of something and share it with your friends. (E.g. sunset, animals, etc.)
3. Listen to a positive and motivational song every day.
4. Volunteer at least once a month.
5. Watch something funny to make you laugh.
6. Motivate yourself after washing up in the morning
7. Sign up with a course to learn something you are interested in
8. Send a letter to your friends to show them you care.
9. Relax and meditate for 5 minutes.
10. Exercise at least once a month.
11. Have a proper meal with your family and engage in a heartfelt conversation with them, do not use your phone during the entire meal.
12. Share your gratitude to those have helped you recently, on social media
13. Take a funny photo with your family or friends. Print it out and put it in an obvious place.
14. Write down an inspirational quote on your notebook every week and find out its origin.
15. Prepare a meal for your family

英文好既人幫我改下

1. Sleep before midnight and get up before 7am.
2. Take a photo of something beautiful and share it with your friends. (E.g. sunset, animals, etc.)
3. Listen to a positive and motivational song every day.
4. Volunteer at least once a month.
5. Watch something funny to make you laugh.
6. Motivate yourself after washing up in the morning
7. Sign up with a course to learn something you are interested in
8. Send a letter to your friends to show them you care.
9. Relax and meditate for 5 minutes.
10. Exercise at least once a month.
11. Have a proper meal with your family and engage in a heartfelt conversation with them, do not use your phone during the entire meal.
12. i am very thanks them
13. Take a funny photo with your family or friends. Print it out and put it in an obvious place.
14. Write down an inspirational quote on your notebook every week and find out its origin.
15. Prepare a meal for your family

good tiger遊戲

1.係fb/ig打一篇笑話
2.10點鐘起身，睇新聞
3.去M記用薯條砌隻貓樣既公仔，影上Fb/ig
4.畫一隻老虎貼上Fb/ig
5.當你準備正式成為老虎，係屋企對住個窗大叫 YES!!!
6.落街執垃圾
7.上連登到任何一個帖按下正評
8.Tag "I_am_tiger_yeah"
9.克服心底既恐懼，落街同一個路人打招呼
10.8點起身，同樓下公公婆婆做運動
11.係手心用原子筆畫一個太陽
12.搵一日睇周星馳的笑片
13.上youtube 聽一首正能量歌
14.去剪頭髮
15.剪指甲
16.想盡辦法令自己覺得充實
17.去一個最近的海邊，吹下海風
18.去運動場跑步
19.去行山
20.回想19日的行為自己有沒有做齊
21.同其他tiger交流
22.去海邊坐下(安全地方)
23.讓座比有需要既人
24.去捐血
25.直接約見一位tiger
26.自定一個日期，那個日期前要認識到一個新的朋友(網上也可)
27.10點起身，落街做運動
28.同街上的人吹水(但不要騷擾到別人)
29.決心做一個充滿正能量的人
30-49. 每日10點起身，聽住正能量的歌，落街做運動。另外要同其他老虎講下個日做咗啲乜
50.10點起身，你已經習慣了充實的日子，充滿意義的一日又開始了！

成事第一個支持

1.首先，入會就要交一定金額

然後加入一個大group

收集到的金錢，可交由信賴既人或機構保存

2.遊戲開始時，先訂立主持人 然後是gm

Gm工作需要每天向主持人匯報自己group 既成果

然後主持人向公眾交代參加遊戲者人數，今天完成目標人數

3.每名gm 可負責5~6人 組成一個子group

方便會員匯報每天事情

4.. 每做左一件事，要係個group 到報到

E.g. 12點前訓，7點起

可以係起身後到group 報到

以上只是個人意見，可作修改

整合各巴打既建議

1.早睡早起 (12點前訓 7點起起身)
2. 影一張自己覺得靚既野 分享比身邊既朋友 (可以係日落 可以係動物)
3. 每日至少聽一次正能量歌.(皆大歡喜, 紅日 ,生命無價)
4. 一個月至少做一次義工
5. 睇笑片令自己大笑一場
6. 每朝梳洗完對住鏡自我鼓勵 (例如我今日面試實得x3)
7. 搵一樣興趣去學 充實自己
8. 寫一封信比你既朋友 關心下佢近況(可以係成日見既/去左外國/好耐無搵既)
9. 完全唔做任何野 係一個靜既環境冥想五分鐘
10. 一星期跑一次步 無跑開既巴打跑1-2km
有跑開既6-8km(令到自己有累既感覺 釋放曬自己既壓力 但量力而為)
11.同屋企人正經食一餐飯 唔可以用手機 關心下屋企人
12. 搵一個呢個星期幫過你/令你開心嘅人去多謝佢，並分享比你既朋友/gm聽
13. 同屋企人/好朋友影一張搞笑嘅合照， 如果可以曬出黎 並放係自己常見既地方
14 係自己schedule book寫低一句正面格言(每星期)，並且搵出佢嘅典故
15. 為屋企人煮一餐(早午晚餐皆可)
16. 寫有鼓勵字句既memo 並痴去一粒朱古力/糖果上 之後送比你既同事/同學

1.    Sleep before midnight and get up before 7am.
2.    Take a photo of a beautiful moment/thing and share it to your friends. (E.g. sunset, animals, etc.)
3.    Listen to a positive and motivational song every day.
4.    Volunteer at least once a month.
5.    Watch comedy movies to make you laugh.
6.    Motivate yourself after your personal grooming(e.g I will pass my exam x3)
7.    Get involved with a course to learn something you are keen on.
8.    Send a mail to your friends to show them you care.
9.    Relax and mediate for 5 minutes.
10.    Exercise or play sport at least once a month.
11.    Have a proper meal with your family and have a great conversation with them, do not use your cell phone during the entire meal.
12.    Say thank you to those have helped you, and share this to your friends/gm)
13.    Take a funny photo with your family members/ best friends. Print it out and put it in an obvious place.
14.    Write down an inspirational motto on your notebook every week and find out its allusion.
15.    Make a family meal.
16. Attach a memo with encouraging word to a chocolate/candy , and give it your classmate/colleague.
